name: Accretia
description:
Alone and left behind in an abandoned station not knowing who or what you are - can you escape?

Since this game uses WASD controls, it's Desktop-only and available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

This game was made for OST Game Jam #2 and includes music from these artists:

Atmospherium - Accretia
Website link: https://twitter.com/atmospherium

Possums At Twilight - a train back to...
Website link: https://twilightpossum.wixsite.com/home

MelonadeM - nothing matters
Website link: https://melonadem.carrd.co/

Viravax - Declining Sanity
Website link: https://viravax.carrd.co/
